text.p: BOMBAY, July 31 (Reutes) - Call money at 0945 IST
The indicative call rates are based on contributions from
ABN Amro, Andhra Bank, Bank of Baroda, Bank of India, Bank of

Scotia, Birla Capital AMC, Canara Bank, Centurion Bank, Citibank N.A., Corporation Bank, Discount and Finance House of India, Global Trust Bank, Indusind Bank, Industrial Credit and Investment Corporation of India (ICICI), ICICI Securities & Finance Co., Industrial Development Bank of India (IDBI), IDBI Bank Ltd, Indian Overseas Bank, Securities Trading Corporation of India (STCI),
India (SBI), Standard Chartered Bank, Unit Trust of India (UTI)
For contributions contact money desk on (022) 265 9000
